Reviews.Title: First time
Reviews.Author: Larry Ozuna
Reviews.Content: It's my first experience with a security camera, and I feel as though I made an excellent first choice purchase. Nice width and depth of view with this model, and extremely clear picture with this brand, both day and night!  Own three for broad coverage of the entire area of my shop (1,000 sq ft).  Smaller cameras in place for office and hall, but same brand.

ProductInfo.Features: Everfocus Electronics Indoor True Day/night Ir 3-axis Mini Dome Camera
ProductInfo.Name: Everfocus ED730 Indoor True Day/night W/ Dwdr Perp Ir Dome 720+tvl 2.8-12mm 100ft.ir
